attractions.title: Karonga Cultural Centre
attractions.description: A vibrant cultural hub showcasing traditional dances, crafts, and historical exhibitions of the northern region tribes.

attractions.title: Lake Malawi Beach
attractions.description: Pristine sandy beaches along the world's third largest lake, perfect for swimming, fishing, and sunset views.

attractions.title: Karonga Museum
attractions.description: Home to the famous Malawisaurus fossil and exhibits tracing human evolution in the region.

attractions.title: Kayelekera Mine Viewpoint
attractions.description: Viewpoint overlooking one of Africa's largest uranium mines with educational tours about mineral resources.

attractions.title: Livingstonia Mission
attractions.description: Historical mission station established by Scottish missionaries in the 19th century with panoramic views.

attractions.title: Rukuru River Park
attractions.description: Beautiful riverside park ideal for picnics, bird watching, and nature walks along the riverbanks.

attractions.title: Karonga Market
attractions.description: Vibrant local market offering fresh produce, traditional crafts, and authentic Malawian goods.

attractions.title: Chilumba Harbor
attractions.description: Important harbor on Lake Malawi serving as a transportation and fishing hub with scenic views.
